segments.text: Jim is a genius . He gets along well with everybody and he can always get the work done .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A boss likes him a lot . He says Jim is a good team player .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Everybody would like to have Jim on their team . Because he is funny and helpful and he can contribute a lot to the team he belongs to .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we all should learn something from him .
segments.speaker: S2
